TopicTitle: Money limitation, ways to earn money, and please get Career released!

Articles.Content:
I was thinking a way to earn money would be you could take on jobs to do X and get paid Y

So, for instance, you could pick up a job to get a comms satilite up for a country, nation, what-have-you and get paid for it maybe in one sum, or you could get paid a daily/monthly amount for having it up.

Something like that, and I would also enjoy if there was a fund you had to spend on your rockets and such, having no spending limit isn't all that great :c

Career mode is very much planned for the future of KSP, as it says on the FAQ and it has been revealed that the next update (0.22) will feature one of the first steps of career mode, the tech tree.

If you're not opposed to using mods, I recommend Mission Controller Extended which adds finance managing and missions to complete.

In any case, since this is a planned feature, I am locking this thread. Have a nice day.
